tests.name: Simple WhatsApp Query
tests.message: What's the capital of Japan and what time zone is it in? Keep it brief.

tests.name: Reasoning Prompt
tests.message: A farmer has 17 sheep. All but 9 die. How many sheep are left? Explain your reasoning step by step.

tests.name: GitHub Skill (gh CLI)

tests.message: Use Claude Code to read the README.md file in /Users/sacmini/Documents/Codebase/Personal/Rajniti and give me a 3-sentence summary of the project.

tests.name: Exec (Cursor Agent)
